hero.title: Find Your Person
hero.subtitle: Real connections, powered by AI. Not just a match — but someone who truly understands you.

whyPizoo.title: Why Pizoo?
whyPizoo.subtitle: Because finding love shouldn't feel like work
whyPizoo.story: In a world of endless swiping, Pizoo is different. We believe that everyone deserves to find someone who makes their heart skip a beat. Someone who gets their jokes, shares their dreams, and makes ordinary moments extraordinary.
whyPizoo.mission: Our mission is simple: help you find not just a date, but your person. The one who makes you feel at home.

features.title: Why Choose Pizoo?
features.subtitle: Everything you need to find your perfect match

items.title: Smart Matching
items.description: Our AI-powered algorithm finds compatible matches based on your preferences and interests

items.title: Video Calls

items.title: Safe & Secure
items.description: Verified profiles and advanced security features keep you protected

items.title: Real-time Chat
items.description: Instant messaging with photos, emojis, and voice messages

items.title: Location Based
items.description: Find people near you or explore matches from around the world

items.title: 24/7 Support
items.description: Our team is always here to help with any questions or concerns

privacy.title: Your Safety, Our Priority
privacy.subtitle: We take your security seriously. Here's how we protect you:

items.title: End-to-End Encryption
items.description: All your messages and photos are encrypted. Only you and your match can see them.

items.title: Verified Profiles
items.description: We use AI-powered photo verification to ensure every profile is real and authentic.

items.title: No AI Surveillance
items.description: Our AI helps you find matches, but never reads your private conversations.

items.title: Anti-Fake System
items.description: Advanced algorithms and manual review to prevent fake accounts and scammers.

items.title: GDPR Compliant
items.description: Your data is protected according to Swiss and European privacy laws.

items.title: 24/7 Moderation
items.description: Our team monitors for inappropriate behavior and responds quickly to reports.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that works for you

footer.description: The #1 dating app in Switzerland. Meet new people, start amazing conversations, and find your life partner.
